topicTitle: Mark's song with no auto tune! :D

posts.postText:
If you post the acapella/vox track, seperate from the instrumental track, I could autotune it...

Not that it needs it, it sounds great.
Purely for novelty's sake.

>> If you post the acapella/vox track, seperate from the instrumental track, I could autotune it...

Not that it needs it, it sounds great.
Purely for novelty's sake.  It was auto tuned before and sounded bad.
